definition: Sachsen or Saxony, Bundesland in east of Germany, bordering on Poland and Czech republic, capital Dresden 德累斯頓|德累斯顿[De2 lei4 si1 dun4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Sachsen or Saxony, Bundesland in east of Germany, bordering on Poland and Czech republic, capital Dresden 德累斯頓|德累斯顿[De2 lei4 si1 dun4]

sentences.english: Saxong is famous for its long history and rich cultural traditions.
sentences.chinese: 萨克森州以悠久的历史和丰富的文化传统而闻名于世。

sentences.english: The Dowager Duchess of Saxe-Coburg and Gotha continued to reside in Coburg.
sentences.chinese: 在萨克森公爵夫人太后科堡与哥达继续居住在科堡。

sentences.english: Vegetables in Saxony are highly prized growing in the Ebe Valley.
sentences.chinese: 蔬菜在萨克森州的珍贵增长在江部谷。

sentences.english: Martin Luther was born in 1483 at Eisleben, Saxony, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 1483年马丁路德出生于德国，萨克森，艾斯莱本。

sentences.english: A new generation of electrically conductive yarns has been developed at Schsische Baumwollspinnerei GmbH, Venusberg.
sentences.chinese: 萨克森棉纺公司研制了新一代导电纱线。

sentences.english: The Jobs book will be his fourth major biography.
sentences.chinese: 《乔布斯传》将是艾萨克森完成的第四本传记。

sentences.english: But Isaacson's biography suggests that he was much more of a tweaker.
sentences.chinese: 但是艾萨克森的传记中暗示他不仅仅是一个“巧匠”。

sentences.english: Mona recounted to Isaacson her first encounter with Jobs.
sentences.chinese: 莫娜向艾萨克森重述了和乔布斯第一次见面的过程。

sentences.english: Saxen, now married and living in Berkeley, Calif., said after that incident, food was an escape.
sentences.chinese: 萨克森现已结婚并居住在哈里发的伯克利。

sentences.english: He was a prisoner in the Dachau and Sachsenhausen concentration camps in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 他是德国达濠和萨克森豪斯集中营的一个囚犯。

sentences.english: Isaacson’s authorized biography of Jobs goes on sale Monday.
sentences.chinese: 艾萨克森所著的乔布斯授权传记将于22日发售。

sentences.english: Wulff was previously state premier of Lower Saxony in Hanover.
sentences.chinese: 武尔夫以前是首府位于汉诺威的下萨克森州的州长。

definition: Württemberg, region of southwest Germany, former state around Stuttgart 斯圖加特|斯图加特[Si1 tu2 jia1 te4]
the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Dresden, capital of Saxony 薩克森州|萨克森州[Sa4 ke4 sen1 zhou1], Germany

pinyin: Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2

definition: Sachsen or Saxony, Bundesland in east of Germany, bordering on Poland and Czech republic, capital Dresden 德累斯頓|德累斯顿[De2 lei4 si1 dun4]
